raw_comment: I have a graph representing a parent's income. The graph shows the percentage of poorer and richer families. However, I find the graph a bit confusing, so I'm not entirely sure if my interpretation is correct. Please don't rely solely on my understanding of it! Haha.
ace_sentences: The graph represents a parent's income.
The graph shows the percentage of poorer families.
The graph shows the percentage of richer families.
I am not sure that my interpretation is correct.
A reader must not rely only on my understanding of the graph.
